channel.title: Possible Inqu rework(no more mini NK)
channel.description:
Okay before you type in the comments...YES! I did post something like this before in the forums. It was called the detective. I will delete that one soon.
This is a rework on the inqu since I hear many people in game say how inqu is just a mini NK. This version of inqu allows for him to be a invest class but is not completely randomized on the targets. This also helps from you randomly becoming a heathen due to RNG. Tgis also helps prevent you randomly dying in game from inqu, which is not fun.
This inqu also can side with evil or BD. Or Evan stay solo killing your targets.
># Inquisitor Neut Invest
>[color=yellow]Passive 1;[/color] [color=Brown]Holy blessings -[/color] You are death immune once
>[color=yellow]Day ability 1;[/color] >[color=Brown] Sixth Sense -[/color] Select a player, If your target can attack someone, then prevent them tonight and attack them [2 uses]‚Äù
>[color=yellow]Day ability 2;[/color] >[color=Brown]Ruthless efficiency-[/color] Your next attack will go through death Immunity _**[2 uses]**_
>[color=yellow]Night ability 1;[/color] >[color=Brown]Quick Hunch -[/color] Select a player, Find out if they have attacked someone before or is attacking someone tonight. It will say they attacked someone even if the attack failed to kill. You will also prevent any invest classes from visiting this target_**[unlimited uses]**_ > >[color=yellow]Night ability 2;[/color] [color=Brown]Personal Business -[/color] Attack a player that you have found who attacked someone else _**[unlimited uses]**_
>[color=yellow]Win Con - [/color] Kill 2 player that have successfully killed another player
NOTES: If poss uses someone to kill than it will still count as poss killing someone not the person that was forced to attack for him.
